intro: HTML entry template: mount point, meta tags, and initial resources.

notes.content: The app mount point. Vite will load ./main.ts, which creates the Vue app and mounts it onto this element.
A fallback CSS animation for petals. The runtime petal system is now primarily controlled by the Vue app, but the base keyframes and styles are kept for reliability.
Vite entry point. This is the only required script tag for bootstrapping the SPA; everything else is bundled from here.
